name: Johto Redrawn
description:
Fly around the popular Johto region, redrawn by @PokemonRedrawn on Twitter! (See links)

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to control
  • Hold SHIFT to move faster
  • R to Reset current room
  • ESCAPE to return to main menu
  • Q/E to Zoom in/out (When Flying)
  • Left click to jump to mouse position (When Flying)

Useful links and Credits:

https://retroredrawn.com/johto/

https://twitter.com/PokemonRedrawn

https://twitter.com/yanako_rpgs
